What is the remainder when 2007 is divided by 25?
inference: Final Answer: \\boxed{7}. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: Since 25 divides evenly into 2000 and 2007 is 7 more than 2000, the remainder when 2007 is divided by 25 is $\boxed{7}$.
